events.name: For geothermal or oilfield brines to succeed as a source of lithium supply, a proven process for DLE will be required.
events.wd_label: For geothermal or oilfield brines to succeed as a source of lithium supply, a proven process for DLE will be required.
events.wd_description: A number of companies testing various DLE approaches. While their ideas differ, the concept remains the same: letting the brine flow through a lithium-bonding material using adsorption, ion-exchange, membrane-separation, or solvent-extraction processes, followed by a polishing solution to obtain lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide.

events.name: Ion-exchange
events.wd_description: Ion-exchange is another DLE process where lithium ions are exchanged with other ions in a material to capture lithium.
